Uses of Class
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.SearchCategory

Packages that use SearchCategory
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui This package is for Global Search UI classes. 
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.ecsf This package is for classes implementing ECSF specific searching within Global Search. 
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.filters This package is for classes implementing filters within Global Search. 
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.managed This package is for Global Search managed bean classes. 
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.personalization This package is for Global Search UI MDS personalization related classes.
This package is part of the internal implementation of Global Search, do not use classes from it outside of the Global Search project. 
oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.util This package contains the API for external code to call into Global Search functionality.
